class.name: VisualAccidentalNoise
class.description: Provides a convenient way to build the noise with visual nodes. The interface is very similar to [VisualShader] editor and allows to combine many nodes into components with the interface based on [AnimationTree] editor.

method.name: generate
method.description: Generates a noise chain from visual noise nodes. The output node is the last instruction index generated in the noise chain. Generated automatically if the main component is set or changed, so in most cases it doesn't need to be re-generated. If setting variable noise via code and the visual noise has [VisualAccidentalNoiseNodeGetVar] specifed, the noise has to be re-generated to bring in variable function from code to visual noise.

members.member: Sets the maximum value by which the noise is clamped when generated.
Sets the minimum value by which the noise is clamped when generated.

If set to [code]true[/code], the last instruction index generated from visual noise nodes will get clamped by [member clamp_low] and [member clamp_high]. Warning: if generating color textures, this will turn the image into grayscale.
The main component node from which the noise is generated. Can contain other components and nodes.

signal.name: component_changed
signal.description: Emitted when component is changed with another one.
